name: Dropping Nuclear Ballz
description:
Dropping nuclear ballz is a great time waster where your main objective is to let the nuclear balls into the barriel for radio active wastes by opening the gate. If a ball miss a barriel, it will be destroyed. Throughout playing Dropping nuclear ballz the difficulty of the game progresses by increased speed of the barriels.

How to Play:
- To open the gate just tap on the screen. Ballz will start to fall through the hole. To close the gate just move finger off the screen.
There are 3 kind of barriels:
Golden barriel(multiplier x3)
Regular white barriel(Gives you 1 point)
Side down barriel(You don't get any points and you will probably loose any ball colliding with it)

Yes we know... this is a certified boredom killer regardless of age.
